name: Zak Nesler
title: Full-Stack Engineer
qualities: A keen eye for detail and design
Loves running into problems, but loves solving them even more
Enjoys writing self-documenting, tested, and tidy code

description_list: Covers the entire development process from design to implementation and testing with a small team of developers
Designed and developed a customer-facing insurance dashboard with Next.js, with microservices to interface with 3rd party APIs and insurance/dealership systems
Collaborated with marketing and business teams to design and implement new features to increase user engagement and improve user experience
Utilizes microservice architecture with MERN stack, Next.js/Typescript, and Azure DevOps for CI and deployment
Implemented communication logging feature covering the entire stack with great feedback from end users
Improved UI/UX, loading times, and optimized SQL stored procedures
Utilized Express.js, Angular, and SQL Server
Designed and implemented an admin interface to manage warehouse employees & permissions
Managed a team of 3 developers to design and implement features for an existing web application
Utilized .NET Core, React, and SQL Server

education.description: Graduated cum laude with a B.Sc. degree in Computer Science. One of two recipients of the Outstanding Senior Award in Computer Science.
courses: Python, Java, C, C++, Go, Racket, PHP, HTML/CSS/JS, Unix
